task.title: Insert a link to external content
task.shortdesc: If you want to link to anything on the internet, use an external cross-reference.

step.cmd: Add the href attribute with the relative path to the topic you want to link to.
Add the scope attribute and set it to external.
Add the format attribute and set it to the type of content you are pointing to. In general, if you are pointing to a web page, use html.
Provide text for the link as the contents of the xref element.

taskbody.example: For example, here's a link to Google. The source is <xref href="http://www.google.com" scope="external" format="html">Google</xref>.
